recommended: 带高度显示与指南针功能的GPS手表；
较为齐全的个人医护包（ 内含：纱布、绷带、消毒纸巾、创可贴止痛药、解暑药品及任何适当的个人药品 ）
一个能够容纳所需装备的背包；
recommended_en: A trash bag for personal rubbish;
GPS watch with altimeter and compass function;
More substantial first-aid kit; (sterile dressings, strapping tape, antiseptic wipes, band-aids, painkillers, heat relief medicines and any other personal medications )
A backpack that can hold all of the gears;
